Title: Relates to the nondisclosure of an individual reporting a violation of a local law or ordinance
Summary: Relates to the nondisclosure of an individual reporting a violation of a local law or ordinance.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to the nondisclosure of an individual reporting a violation of a local law or ordinance; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
